an5.157:1.1: “Pancannam, bhikkhave, puggalanam katha dukkatha puggale puggalam upanidhaya.
an5.157:2.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, assaddhassa saddhakatha dukkatha?
an5.157:2.2: Assaddho, bhikkhave, saddhakathaya kacchamanaya abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:2.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, saddhasampadam attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:3.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, dussilassa silakatha dukkatha?
an5.157:3.2: Dussilo, bhikkhave, silakathaya kacchamanaya abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:3.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, silasampadam attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:4.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, appassutassa bahusaccakatha dukkatha?
an5.157:4.2: Appassuto, bhikkhave, bahusaccakathaya kacchamanaya abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:4.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadam attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:5.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, maccharissa cagakatha dukkatha?
an5.157:5.2: Macchari, bhikkhave, cagakathaya kacchamanaya abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:5.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, cagasampadam attani na samanupassati na ca labhati tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:6.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, duppannassa pannakatha dukkatha?
an5.157:6.2: Duppanno, bhikkhave, pannakathaya kacchamanaya abhisajjati kuppati byapajjati patitthiyati kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:6.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, pannasampadam attani na samanupassati, na ca labhati tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:6.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam puggalanam katha dukkatha puggale puggalam upanidhaya.
an5.157:7.1: Pancannam, bhikkhave, puggalanam katha sukatha puggale puggalam upanidhaya.
an5.157:8.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, saddhassa saddhakatha sukatha?
an5.157:8.2: Saddho, bhikkhave, saddhakathaya kacchamanaya nabhisajjati na kuppati na byapajjati na patitthiyati na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:8.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, saddhasampadam attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:9.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, silavato silakatha sukatha?
an5.157:9.2: Silava, bhikkhave, silakathaya kacchamanaya nabhisajjati na kuppati na byapajjati na patitthiyati na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:9.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, silasampadam attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:10.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, bahussutassa bahusaccakatha sukatha?
an5.157:10.2: Bahussuto, bhikkhave, bahusaccakathaya kacchamanaya nabhisajjati na kuppati na byapajjati na patitthiyati na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:10.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, sutasampadam attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:11.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, cagavato cagakatha sukatha?
an5.157:11.2: Cagava, bhikkhave, cagakathaya kacchamanaya nabhisajjati na kuppati na byapajjati na patitthiyati na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:11.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, cagasampadam attani samanupassati, labhati ca tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:12.1: Kasma ca, bhikkhave, pannavato pannakatha sukatha?
an5.157:12.2: Pannava, bhikkhave, pannakathaya kacchamanaya nabhisajjati na kuppati na byapajjati na patitthiyati na kopanca dosanca appaccayanca patukaroti.
an5.157:12.4: Tanhi so, bhikkhave, pannasampadam attani samanupassati labhati ca tatonidanam pitipamojjam.
an5.157:12.6: Imesam kho, bhikkhave, pancannam puggalanam katha sukatha puggale puggalam upanidhaya”ti.
